mapper.select:
SELECT
top.catgr_nme catgr_nme #상품코드
bot.catgr_nme catgr_nme #상품코드
mid.catgr_nme catgr_nme #상품코드
, SUM(rel.qunt)'selQunt' #판매수량 , SUM(IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0))'retrnQunt' #환불수량 , SUM(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0))) 'relQunt' #순 판매수량 FROM all_sel_prodct_view p LEFT JOIN retrn_tb r ON r. prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN stck_tb s ON s. prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN exchng_refnd_tb e ON e. prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN rels_tb rel ON rel.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq
JOIN catgr_tb top ON top.catgr_seq = p.top_catgr_Seq # 유동적
JOIN catgr_tb top ON top.catgr_seq = p.top_catgr_Seq # 유동적 AND top.catgr_nme = #{selectedTopCatgrNme} JOIN catgr_tb mid ON mid.catgr_seq = p.mid_catgr_Seq # 유동적 AND mid.catgr_nme = #{selectedMidCatgrNme} JOIN catgr_tb bot ON bot.catgr_seq = p.bot_catgr_Seq # 유동적
JOIN catgr_tb top ON top.catgr_seq = p.top_catgr_Seq # 유동적 AND top.catgr_nme = #{selectedTopCatgrNme} JOIN catgr_tb mid ON mid.catgr_seq = p.mid_catgr_Seq # 유동적
WHERE p.prodct_Seq>0
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 3 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 30 DAY, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 90 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 180 DAY, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDatSech}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDatSech}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY
top.catgr_nme
bot.catgr_nme
mid.catgr_nme
ORDER BY SUM(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0))) DESC limit 0,10;

SELECT
top.catgr_nme catgr_nme #상품코드
bot.catgr_nme catgr_nme #상품코드
mid.catgr_nme catgr_nme #상품코드
, SUM(rel.sel_pric) 'sel_Pric' #판매가 , SUM(rel.qunt)'selQunt' #판매수량 , SUM(IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0))'retrnQunt' #환불수량 , SUM(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0))) 'relQunt' #순 판매수량 , SUM(rel.sel_pric *(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0))) 'retrnConTnTotalSelPric' #판매금액 , SUM((rel.sel_pric - rel.instck_pric)*(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0)))) 'netInc' #순이익 , (SUM((rel.sel_pric - rel.instck_pric)*(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0))))) / (SUM(rel.sel_pric *(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0)))))*100'marginRat' #마진율 , SUM(rel.sel_pric *(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0)))) 'totalSelPric' #판매합계 FROM all_sel_prodct_view p LEFT JOIN retrn_tb r ON r. prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN stck_tb s ON s. prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN exchng_refnd_tb e ON e. prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN rels_tb rel ON rel.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq
JOIN catgr_tb top ON top.catgr_seq = p.top_catgr_Seq # 유동적
JOIN catgr_tb top ON top.catgr_seq = p.top_catgr_Seq # 유동적 AND top.catgr_nme = #{selectedTopCatgrNme} JOIN catgr_tb mid ON mid.catgr_seq = p.mid_catgr_Seq # 유동적 AND mid.catgr_nme = #{selectedMidCatgrNme} JOIN catgr_tb bot ON bot.catgr_seq = p.bot_catgr_Seq # 유동적
JOIN catgr_tb top ON top.catgr_seq = p.top_catgr_Seq # 유동적 AND top.catgr_nme = #{selectedTopCatgrNme} JOIN catgr_tb mid ON mid.catgr_seq = p.mid_catgr_Seq # 유동적
WHERE p.prodct_Seq>0
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 3 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 30 DAY, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 90 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now() - INTERVAL 180 DAY, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rel.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDatSech}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDatSech}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY
top.catgr_nme
bot.catgr_nme
mid.catgr_nme
ORDER BY SUM(rel.sel_pric *(IFNULL(rel.qunt,0) - (IFNULL(r.qunt,0)+IFNULL(e.qunt,0)))) DESC limit 0,10;

SELECT ex.prodct_seq, pr.prodct_nme, SUM(ex.qunt) AS qunt FROM exchng_refnd_tb ex LEFT JOIN prodct_tb pr ON ex.prodct_seq = pr.prodct_seq WHERE pr.prodct_nme LIKE '%${prodctNmeSech}%'
AND ex.dat = CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN #{beginDatepicker} AND #{endDatepicker}
GROUP BY ex.prodct_seq ORDER BY qunt DESC LIMIT 0 , 10;

SELECT ex.prodct_seq, pr.prodct_nme, ex.qunt AS refnd_qunt, re.qunt AS sel_qunt, (SUM(ex.qunt) / SUM(re.qunt)) * 100 AS refnd_rat FROM exchng_refnd_tb ex LEFT JOIN prodct_tb pr ON ex.prodct_seq = pr.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN rels_tb re ON ex.prodct_seq = re.prodct_seq WHERE pr.prodct_nme LIKE '%${prodctNmeSech}%'
AND ex.dat = CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN #{beginDatepicker} AND #{endDatepicker}
GROUP BY ex.prodct_seq ORDER BY refnd_rat DESC LIMIT 0 , 10;

SELECT ex.prodct_seq, pr.prodct_nme, pr.sel_pric, SUM(ex.qunt) AS refnd_qunt, IFNULL(SUM(re.qunt), 0) AS sel_qunt, IFNULL((re.sel_pric - re.instck_pric) * SUM(re.qunt), 0) AS profit, (1 - SUM(re.instck_pric * re.qunt) / SUM(re.sel_pric * re.qunt)) * 100 AS margn_rat, IFNULL(re.sel_pric * SUM(re.qunt), 0) AS sel_sum FROM exchng_refnd_tb ex LEFT JOIN prodct_tb pr ON ex.prodct_seq = pr.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN rels_tb re ON ex.prodct_seq = re.prodct_seq WHERE pr.prodct_nme LIKE '%${prodctNmeSech}%'
AND ex.dat = CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) AND CURDATE()
AND ex.dat BETWEEN #{beginDatepicker} AND #{endDatepicker}
GROUP BY ex.prodct_seq ORDER BY refnd_qunt DESC LIMIT 0 , 10;
